subject: Baseball
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: The Yankees’ Joe Girardi and Brian Cashman addressed critics of their A.L.C.S. rotation, announced the dismissal of a pitching coach and talked about retaining free-agent stars.
snippet: The Yankees’ Joe Girardi and Brian Cashman addressed critics of their A.L.C.S. rotation, announced the dismissal of a pitching coach and talked about retaining free-agent stars.
